homeContent9: This iconic riverside venue is opening its doors for the first time. Weddings - Corporate Entertainment - Private events

collection.homeSection2Text9: Uniquely positioned on the banks of the Thames with sweeping views of river and countryside.
A stoneâ€™s throw from London, Henley-on-Thames offers easy transport links to the South-East by road and rail.
An historic, privately-owned venue with breathtaking gardens and grounds available for exclusive hire.

homeAlternatingCol2.homeAlternatingCol2Content:
Introducing Remenham Court, an historic private home on the banks of the Thames.

This unique riverside venue offers a flexible entertaining space.

homeAlternatingCol2.homeAlternatingCol2Content: With sweeping views across the grounds to the river Thames, Remenham Court offers a range of options for entertaining your guests in the beautiful gardens and open-air spaces.

homeAlternatingCol2.homeAlternatingCol2Content: As a private home Remenham Court offers unique versatility. Weddings, corporate entertaining and special events can be tailored to your needs - from fully managed events to simple venue hire.

homeSection4Text9: Host of the annual Henley Royal Regatta - we look forward to welcoming you.
getInTouchContent: Whether you have an event and date in mind, or simply want to discuss your options, get in touch and we can help turn your ideal event into reality.
section2Content54: Introducing Remenham Court. An historic private venue on the banks of the River Thames.
section3Content54: A unique riverside venue, offering flexible entertaining space

section2Content57: The backdrop of the River Thames adds beauty and tranquility to the gardens and grounds of Remenham Court
section3Content57: Sweeping lawns and intimate outdoor spaces
section2Content59: As a private house, Remenham Court offers a versatile venue. Available for day or evening events or for longer hire
section2Content16:
Remenham Court and Gardens is available for exclusive, all weekend weddings and unforgettable days beside the River Thames.

We are delighted to welcome you and arrange the wedding you have dreamed of. Let your imagination run wild and let us know what you wish. Whatever your vision, we can help – and maybe offer some ideas you may not have considered. As a private estate, we have the flexibility and expertise to make it happen.

We are not Wedding Planners but every event we are privileged to host is special and we will work closely with you and your designer or, should you choose them, our own event planners, Naïve Productions, to make your wedding as individual as the people at the heart of it.
section3Content16:
Remenham Court is currently in the process of acquiring a licence to hold Civil Marriages and Blessing Ceremonies. Meanwhile, we are a beautiful location for a Humanist Wedding or Partnership Celebration.

Outside, we have a spectacular Walled Sunken Garden, with a lovely stone stairway and vine covered terrace overlooking the Thames where up to 250 guests can enjoy your hospitality and celebrate your day.
section4Content16:
You can invite up to 200 guests to enjoy a delicious Champagne and Canapé Reception on the Terrace overlooking the river, and beyond, and to dine by sparkling candlelight in a gorgeous, lined marquee standing on the lawn of the Walled Garden

Or, for a smaller Reception, you might prefer to invite up to 50 guests to wine and dine in our lovely Orangery, while, for a truly magnificent party, you can host up to 300 seated guests in a large marquee on Remenham Court Field, on the banks of the Thames.
section5Content16:
Exclusive hire of Remenham Court includes sleeping accommodation for up to 28 special guests.

The Main House can provide sleeping accommodation for 14 guest in seven exquisitely refurbished bedrooms, including the Bridal Suit, overlooking the river and garden. In addition, the Gate House has two bedrooms, a bathroom, a kitchen and a private lawn with small stream and rustic bridge and sleeps 4. The perfect retreat for the Groom and Groom’s Men.

Please get in touch to discuss how we can bring your ideas to life, check availability and the cost of your tailored package.
section2Content12: On the outskirts of the beautiful market town of Henley on Thames, site of the world famous Henley Royal Regatta, Remenham Court is well connected by car with ample parking and easy access to main line trains to London, only 40 minutes away. The property also has a private jetty (no mooring) for guests wishing to arrive by boat, or water taxi.
section2Content212:
Remenham Court is uniquely placed to offer a flexible experience tailored to you and your guests. 

Whether you are simply looking to hire Remenham Court as a venue with your own choice of suppliers, or are interested in a full wedding or party planning service we will work with you to ensure your event exceeds every expectation.

Remenham Court partners with Henley and London based event company Naive Productions  who can provide you with a range of options to suit you.
section2Content20: Whether you are looking to hire this unique riverside venue for a weekend wedding or party, a one-off event, or to enquire about availability for Henley Royal Regatta, we would be delighted to hear from you.

AlternaingCol254.Section5Content54: Fully refurbished in 2021, the main house offers a versatile and welcoming space. The house can accomodate a range of options for drinks receptions, intimate dining and relaxed evenings, as well as larger scale events.

Set the tone for your event as your guests enter through the entrance hall of Remenham Court. The sweeping staircase with historic portraits of the house and grounds showcases the best of what this unique venue has to offer.

The historic Orangery with breathtaking views across the grounds to the river beyond, offers an ideal location for drinks receptions or smaller scale dinners, seating around 40 guests. The Orangery opens directly onto the terrace so guests can enjoy the evening sunshine or the views from indoors.

Rememham Court boasts seven bedrooms in the main house, ideal for accomodating the main wedding party or the majority of guests to a more intimate event. The Bridal Suite offers stunning views of the garden and River Thames beyond.

Separate from the main house, with unique self-contained accomodation, The Gatehouse offers two additional double bedrooms, bathroom, kitchen and private garden surrounded by a stream. The ideal space for Groom & Groom's Men or family requiring their own private space.

AlternaingCol259.Section5Content59: Remenham Court provides a wide range of choices for your wedding. The nearby Parish Church of St Nicholas Remenham and Henley Town Hall offer stunning venues for your ceremony.
Corporate events, anniversary celebrations, birthday parties and private events - whether you are looking to host 20 guests or 500. Remenham Court can provide a unique space tailored to your needs.

Each year Henley-on-Thames plays host to the world famous Regatta, attended by royalty, celebrities and guests from around the world.

Remenham Court can be easily accessed from the tow path, central to the Regatta event. Treat your guests to a once-in-lifetime experience - watching the live event from the luxury of this private venue.

AlternaingCol257.Section5Content57: Ideal for canape receptions, the raised terrace provides panoramic views of the river. Drinks and food can be served to your guests while they enjoy views across the River Thames to the countryside beyond
Having enjoyed a drinks reception on the terrace, guests can move on to dine in a bespoke-designed, lined marquee perfectly placed on the Sunken Lawn of the walled garden.

For larger events and those requiring a marquee, 500 guests or more can be accomodated on the Riverside Field, with a unique riverside location next to Remenham Court. For those familiar with Henley Royal Regatta, the Riverside Field is central to the Regatta action each year and is easily accessed via the towpath, just past the Steward's Enclosure.

section2Content139:
Remenham Court and Gardens is available for exclusive, all weekend weddings and unforgettable days beside the River Thames.

We are delighted to welcome you and arrange the wedding you have dreamed of. Let your imagination run wild and let us know what you wish. Whatever your vision, we can help – and maybe offer some ideas you may not have considered. As a private estate, we have the flexibility and expertise to make it happen.

We are not Wedding Planners but every event we are privileged to host is special and we will work closely with you and your designer or, should you choose them, our own event planners, Naïve Productions, to make your wedding as individual as the people at the heart of it.

weddingsTextImageRepeater16.section2Content16:
Remenham Court is available for exclusive, all weekend weddings and unforgettable events beside the River Thames.

We are delighted to welcome you and will work alongside you to ensure your wedding is all you have dreamed of, and more. Let your imagination run wild and we will help turn your ideas into reality. As a private estate, we have the flexibility and expertise to make it happen.

We are not Wedding Planners but every event we are privileged to host is special and we will work closely with you and your suppliers or, should you choose them, our own event planners, Naïve Productions, to realise every aspect of your dream wedding.

A range of options are available for wedding ceremonies in close proximity to Remenham Court, allowing your guests to attend the ceremony, then return to celebrate with you by car or even by boat along the River Thames.

St Nicholas, Rememham is an historic parish church seating up to 150 guests. For those looking for a civil ceremony, Henley Town Hall is a stunning building in the centre of town and can also be easily accessed from Remenham Court by car or by boat.

Whatever you are looking for from your ceremony, our local expertise can help you find the perfect place to exchange your vows.

The Terrace at Remenham Court can host up to 200 guests, enjoying a delicious Champagne and Canapé Reception overlooking the river. Guests can move on to dine by sparkling candlelight in a bespoke-designed, lined marquee perfectly placed on the lawn of the Walled Garden

For a more intimate Reception, the Orangery offers a perfect space for around 50 guests for dinner and drinks. While, for a truly magnificent party, you can host up to 500 seated guests in a large marquee on Remenham Court Field, on the banks of the River Thames.

Exclusive hire of Remenham Court includes sleeping accommodation for up to 28 special guests.

The Main House can provide sleeping accommodation for 14 guests in seven exquisitely refurbished bedrooms, including the Bridal Suit, overlooking the river and garden. In addition, the Lodge House has two bedrooms, a bathroom, a kitchen and a private lawn with small stream and rustic bridge and sleeps 4. The perfect retreat for the Groom and Groom’s Men.

Please get in touch to discuss how we can bring your ideas to life, check availability and the cost of your tailored package.

weddingsTextImageRepeater196.section2Content196:
Remenham Court, with its versative accomodation, excellent transport links and range of options for meetings and breakout sessions as well as entertaining clients and colleages, provides a rare and memorable venue for any corporate entertainment event. 

Birthday parties, anniversaries or simply an escape with friends and family are all easily accomodated at Remenham Court with a wide range of food and entertainment options for all ages and tastes. 

Please contact us to find out more.

weddingsTextImageRepeater198.section2Content198:
Join us for one of the most exclusive events of the summer season. Remenham Court enjoys a unique position, central to the Regatta action each year. Remenham Court is located on the riverfront, close to the finishing line of the Regatta so you and your guests are guaranteed front row seats.

Whether for a private party or corporate event, we offer a peaceful and pleasant site for you and your party to soak up the Henley Royal Regatta atmosphere. With on-site parking and fabulous views of all the action on the river, there is no better way to enjoy the Regatta.

Contact us to find out more about the Regatta Packages we can offer.
